nodes.bodyText: What is the use for passing the sb and info fields to this method? The method is always invoked with ProcessRunner.answer and ProcessRunner.info, so you might as well use those fields directly?
Not sure if I follow? mergeProcessOutput is static, but those fields are not, so I can't use them?
Good point, why don't we remove static from the method as well as it is called as if it was an instance method.
